mapper.select: SELECT ca.cartno, ca.custid, it.itemname as itemname, it.itemprice as itemprice, it.itemimg as itemimg, ca.cartcnt FROM cart ca INNER JOIN item it ON ca.itemno= it.itemno INNER JOIN cust cu ON ca.custid = cu.custid WHERE ca.custid = #{custid}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET itemno =#{itemno},cartcnt=#{cartcnt} WHERE custid = #{custid}
